test.name: Test Case 1 - Add item to todos list

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: C:\Users\op671200\Documents\GitHub\TestingToDoList\Tests\geckodriver-368.log

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.

kw.name: Element Attribute Value Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains expected attribute value.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.name: Test Case 2 - Delete item from todos list

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: C:\Users\op671200\Documents\GitHub\TestingToDoList\Tests\geckodriver-369.log

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.

kw.name: Element Attribute Value Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains expected attribute value.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page does not contain element 'xpath://*[@class="main"]'.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.name: Test Case 3 - Move item in todos to Complited

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: C:\Users\op671200\Documents\GitHub\TestingToDoList\Tests\geckodriver-370.log

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.

kw.name: Element Attribute Value Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by ``locator`` contains expected attribute value.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Select Checkbox
kw.doc: Selects the checkbox identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://*[@class="clear-completed"]' contains exact text 'Clear completed'.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
